summary: A cable from Mexico City requests traces and a POA (Proof of Authority) on Benito Ruiz Suarez, a Cuban national with ties to the American Legion, the hotel industry, and potentially subversive activities, as he is scheduled to attend an ASTA convention in California.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET cable, originating from Mexico City, requests traces and Proof of Authority (POA) concerning Benito Ruiz Suarez, born in 1894 in Cuba, married to Patrocinio Perez, affiliated with the Hotel Nacional, and a founder of the American Legion. He acquired and relinquished American citizenship, has connections to multiple descendants, and is a 33rd-degree Mason. As the sole Cuban delegate to an ASTA convention in California, allegedly financed by the President of the Caribbean area, Ruiz Suarez claims access to internal and external travel information. He also admits to assisting anti-Castro individuals by forging visas and mentions trouble at the Hotel Nacional.
title: Request for Traces and POA on Benito Ruiz Suarez
locations_mentioned: Santa Cruz del Sur, Havana Province, Cuba
